doc:
Judith Roberts (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Judith_Roberts_(actress) 0 Judith Anna Roberts (born November 30, 1934) is an American actress, best known for her roles as Mary Shaw in James Wan's horror film Dead Silence (2007), and as Taslitz, one of "The Golden Girls", in the Netflix comedy-drama series Orange Is the New Black. Judith_Anna_Roberts ( born November_30_,_1934 ) is an_American_actress , best_known for her_roles as Mary_Shaw in James_Wan 's_horror_film_Dead_Silence ( 2007 ) , and as Taslitz , one of " The_Golden_Girls_" , in the_Netflix_comedy-drama_series_Orange Is the_New_Black .
